sn11.18:1.4: Indra’s thousandfold team of horses evoke the swift, thundering storm (Rig Veda 6.47.18, 7.91.6).
sn11.18:1.8: As does Sigālaka in DN 31:1.3, where they are specified as east, south, west, north, below, and above. Gods were often revered in particular quarters (eg. Atharva Veda 19.17).
